title: Valkey 8.1's Performance Gains Disrupt In-Memory Databases
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: Redis fork Valkey, with a new multithreading architecture, delivers a threefold improvement in speed and memory efficiency gains.
cntitle: Valkey 8.1 的性能提升颠覆了内存数据库
cndescription: Redis 的分支 Valkey 采用了一种新的多线程架构，在速度上提高了三倍，并提高了内存效率。
